title: Gaza parents desperate as children face starvation under Israeli blockade
description: The BBC's Fergal Keane reports on the rise of malnutrition in Gaza's children.
excerpt: The BBC's Fergal Keane reports on the rise of malnutrition in Gaza's children.
text: Watch: Three freed Israeli hostages arrive in IsraelDoron Steinbrecher, 31, Emily Damari, 28, and Romi Gonen, 24, were seen getting out of a Red Cross vehicle, in footage released by the Israeli Defense Forces.19 Jan 2025Middle East
html:
Watch: Three freed Israeli hostages arrive in Israel

Doron Steinbrecher, 31, Emily Damari, 28, and Romi Gonen, 24, were seen getting out of a Red Cross vehicle, in footage released by the Israeli Defense Forces.

19 Jan 2025

Middle East
